documentation.author: Jane Perez
documentation.purpose: Alert provider that patient has history of QT prolongation when ordering a drug known to cause QT prolongation.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_APPLICATION_E
templateDefinitions.definition: The application being used QUALIFIER APPLICATION
templateDefinitions.description: Application that generated the evoking event

statements.statement: select Application_Name = ap.description, _hidden = ap.application_number from application ap where ap.active_ind = 1 /*and (ap.direct_access_ind = 1 or ap.application_number in (961000,600005,380000)) */ and ap.application_number > 0 and ap.description > " " order application_name

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC and OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_DETAIL_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PROBLEMS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_PROBLEMS exist with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_COURSE for person LINK. Optionally narrow problem matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DIAGNOSIS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_DIAGNOSIS exist with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_CLINICAL_SERVICE, OPT_DX_TYPE, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_CONTRIBUTOR_SYSTEM, OPT_RANK, OPT_CERTAINTY, for encounter OPT_LINK. Optionally narrow diagnosis matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ALERT_FLEX_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Send alert OPT_TITLE stating TXT, OPT_CANCEL_LABEL, OPT_IGNORE_LABEL, OPT_OVERRIDE_REASON, OPT_MODIFY_LABEL, OPT_DEFAULT_LABEL, OPT_ORDERS, OPT_DEFAULT_FIRST_ORDER, OPT_URL_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_URL_ADDRESS, OK_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORM, OPT_FORM_BUTTON_NAME, OPT_FORCE_FORM, OPT_LINK

statements.statement: select distinct Form_Definition = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.definition else "*NONE" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.dcp_forms_ref_id else 0.0 endif, Description = if (t.seq = 1) dfr.description else "NONE" endif from dcp_forms_ref dfr, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan dfr where dfr.active_ind = 1 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 and textlen(trim(dfr.definition)) > 0 join t order Form_Definition

column.value: PowerPorm must be opened, dismiss Alert
PowerForm must be signed, dismiss Alert

customValue.value:
F, Function F-38293 SNOMED International
C0151878 UMLS

values.value: Long QT interval associated with Timothy syndrome
Abnormal QT interval present on electrocardiogram
Abnormal QT interval present on electrocardiography

customValue.value:
F, Function F-38293 SNOMED International
C0151878 UMLS

values.value: Abnormal QT interval present on electrocardiogram
Abnormal QT interval present on electrocardiography
Long QT interval associated with Timothy syndrome

value.value: This patient has a history of @PROBLEM:3 documented on their problem list. You are attempting to order @CATALOGCDDISP:2, which is known to prolong the QT interval.@NEWLINE@NEWLINEPlease consider ordering an alternative therapy if clinically appropriate.

This patient has a history of @DIAGNOSIS:4 documented on their problem list. You are attempting to order @CATALOGCDDISP:2, which is known to prolong the QT interval.@NEWLINE@NEWLINEPlease consider ordering an alternative therapy if clinically appropriate.
